entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 a.m. CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with light snow changing to a few rain showers and ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
